Operation 'get_/areas' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, unclear_purpose, missing_context. Missing summary entirely. Description is vague about what 'boundaries' means and lacks context about the return format and use case. Added clarity about coordinate/geographic data, return structure, and practical use for AI agents to understand when to call this operation.

data.current_description: Provides the geographical boundaries for all the jurisdictions.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve geographical boundaries for all jurisdictions
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the geographical boundaries (coordinates and geographic limits) for all jurisdictions within the City of Surrey. Returns boundary data for each jurisdiction to support location-based traffic event queries and mapping. Useful for determining which jurisdiction a specific location belongs to.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description is vague about what 'boundaries' means and lacks context about the return format and use case. Added clarity about coordinate/geographic data, return structure, and practical use for AI agents to understand when to call this operation.

message: Operation 'get_/events' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description mentions events but doesn't explain the 10 available parameters or what data is returned. Added information about filtering capabilities, return data structure, and practical use cases to improve AI agent interpretability for determining when and how to use this operation.

data.current_description: Provides real time traffic obstruction events.  The event resource provides information about road events (constructions, special events, etc.).
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves real-time traffic obstruction events occurring within the City of Surrey, including constructions, special events, and other road incidents. Supports filtering by location, time range, severity, and event type through query parameters. Returns event details including location, duration, impact, and event classification. Useful for traffic monitoring, route planning, and incident awareness.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description mentions events but doesn't explain the 10 available parameters or what data is returned. Added information about filtering capabilities, return data structure, and practical use cases to improve AI agent interpretability for determining when and how to use this operation.

message: Operation 'get_/jurisdiction' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, unclear_purpose, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description is unclear about what 'jurisdictions' means in this context and doesn't specify what data is returned. Added clarity that these are data-publishing jurisdictions, specified return data includes metadata, and explained the use case for AI agents.

data.current_description: Lists the jurisdictions publishing data through this Open511 API implementation.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a list of all jurisdictions that are publishing traffic obstruction data through this Open511 API implementation. Returns jurisdiction metadata including names, identifiers, and contact information. Useful for discovering available data sources and understanding the geographic coverage of the API.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is unclear about what 'jurisdictions' means in this context and doesn't specify what data is returned. Added clarity that these are data-publishing jurisdictions, specified return data includes metadata, and explained the use case for AI agents.

message: Operation 'get_/jurisdictiongeography' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_context, poor_ai_interpretability. Missing summary. Description is identical to /areas endpoint, creating confusion about the distinction between these operations. Added clarity about coordinate/polygon format, relationship to /jurisdiction endpoint, and specific use cases (spatial queries, mapping) to help AI agents understand when to use this versus /areas.

data.current_description: Provides the geographical boundaries for all the jurisdictions.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the geographical boundaries and geographic coordinates for all jurisdictions publishing data through this Open511 API. Returns boundary polygons or coordinate sets for each jurisdiction to enable spatial queries and location-based filtering of traffic events. Complements the /jurisdiction endpoint by providing geographic data for mapping and geospatial analysis.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is identical to /areas endpoint, creating confusion about the distinction between these operations. Added clarity about coordinate/polygon format, relationship to /jurisdiction endpoint, and specific use cases (spatial queries, mapping) to help AI agents understand when to use this versus /areas.
